ta_photo_1_caption: Enjoy a spicy Nigerian delicacy in Istanbul made from tender goat head, slow-cooked in a savory palm oil sauce infused with bold spices, utazi leaves, and traditional flavors. A true Igbo delight!
ta_photo_2_caption: We can deliver Nigerian food to your doorstep no matter where you are in Istanbul.
ta_photo_3_caption: Experience our hearty Pap & Akara—silky, fermented corn pap paired with golden, crispy bean cakes and Peak Milk or Three Crowns. Indulge in a traditional Nigerian breakfast delight. Order now and get it delivered hot to you.
ta_photo_4_caption: Experience our authentic semo, expertly crafted by stirring premium semovita flour in boiling water until it transforms into a silky, stretchy dough that embodies Nigerian tradition. Order now—only the semo is sold, not the soup!
ta_photo_5_caption: Not a poor man's food, enjoy our garri with milk, sugar, and groundnut. Our meticulous selection of these ingredients gives it a crunchy taste in your mouth and is best served with icy water.

ta_review_5_text:
3,5/5
(ENG) The Grungy Society is one of the popular hamburger restaurant of recent times and the Suadiye branch is neighbor of our 2020’s favorite Enva-i. Actually we came here first, then we stopped by Enva-i and we did this tour twice in the same week to make a better evaluation. While trying Cheeseburger (28?) and Goat Cheese Burger (34?), we wanted to try Özerhisar Ayran, which we heard extremely praised about. Cheeseburger bread and Grungy sauce were good, meatball cooking balance was successful, but black pepper level of patty is a bit high. Although we love goat cheese, we didn't like this burger combination. OzerHisar lovers, my tagline to you: Likes may vary, but we’ve so many good experiences about Ayran and this is not one of them. 
.

ta_review_1_text:
Sosyal medyada bir çok hesapta yapilan paylasimlarda Sevgili sef Didem Senol'un yeni bir menü hazirladigini okuyunca bayram yemegimizi burada yemege karar verdik. Yurtdisindan yabanci misafirlerimiz de oldugu icin hem lokasyon hem de lezzet acisindan iyi bir secim oldugunu dusunduk. Ancak yemegimiz 2. sinif turistik bir lokantadan ileri gidemedi. 

Menu tanitim daveti sirasinda cekilen fotograflarla ilgisi olmayan bir ambiyans. Siradan yemekler. 2. sinif bir Sultanahmet otelinde rastlanacak eski, yipranmis dekorasyon malzemeleri. 

Maalesef Armada oteli eski basarili gunlerini devam ettirememis, manzarisinin ekmegini yemege calisan turistik bir mekan olmayi tercih etmis.

Didem Hanim bu projenin icinde niye yer almis, ismini kullandirmis anlayamadim.

Whether you're craving a hearty stew or delicate pastries, our Iranian restaurant in Istanbul

Nestled in the vibrant city of Istanbul, Ariya brings the rich flavors and culinary traditions of Persia to your table. From the moment you step in, you'll be transported to a world where the aroma of saffron, turmeric, and fresh herbs fills the air.  At Ariya, we pride ourselves on our authentic menu that showcases the best of Persian cuisine. Our dishes are prepared using time-honored recipes
ta_photo_3_caption: Savor the authentic taste of Iran with Kabab Koobideh, now available in Turkey. Served with saffron-infused basmati rice, grilled tomatoes, and fresh herbs, Kabab Koobideh offers a rich, mouthwatering experience that connects Persian culinary heritage with Turkish hospitality. Perfect for a hearty meal, it’s a must-try for food lovers seekin
